alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 12:31PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...BLIZZARD CONDITIONS WILL MAKE TRAVEL NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE FOR PORTIONS OF JEFFERSON COUNTY THIS AFTERNOON... HAZARDS...The combination of a band of heavy snow and winds gusting to 55 mph is producing BLIZZARD conditions. Visibility within the band is ZERO. There are vehicles stranded on roadways with many roads likely impassable. DO NOT attempt to travel in this band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1227 PM EST, a band of heavy snow extended across far northern Jefferson county near the Saint Lawrence River. This band is expected to remain nearly stationary through 3 PM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Clayton, Wellesley Island State Park, Cedar Point State Park, Redwood, Kring Point State Park, Alexandria Bay, Cape Vincent, Chaumont, Three Mile Bay, Millen Bay, Grindstone, Fishers Landing, La Fargeville, Point Peninsula, Plessis and Depauville. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 50 and 52. SAFETY INFO... Travel is nearly impossible in this area with blizzard conditions. &&
